{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer VR200 un V1 1066 1.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit VDSL2 Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/la/products/details/cat-15_Archer-VR200.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_VR200 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Partial Support |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer VR200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 26, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_VR200 |wlclass = AC750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq (Intel);PSB 80920;XWAY VRX288, PSB 80920 EL V1.2; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL128SAIF00; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VDSL2, ADSL2+ |addchip = DSL (ADSL2+) AFE and LD;Lantiq;PSB 80190;Lantiq, XWAY VRX208, PSB 80190, V V1.1;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Lantiq;PSB 8224; |rad1chip2 = Lantiq;PSB 8304; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_vr200 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/vr200v |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = lantiq |subtarget = xrx200 |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dect DECT], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz Wifi 2.4GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
